original_title: Deputy Controller of Immigration and ex-Dy Controller arrested for providing passports to underworld figures
original_body_lines: A Deputy Controller of Immigration & Emigration and a former Deputy Controller have been arrested by the CID for providing passports based on false information to underworld figures Nuresh Supun Dayaratne alias Hinatiyana Mahesh and Shan Arosh Liyanage alias Mathugama Shan, police said.
